title: Contemporary Diamond-Accented Gold Bracelet
materials: accented with 42 Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (0.99cttw). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Modern link design featuring alternating sections of rose gold and white gold. The white gold section is pave-set with sparkling diamonds. Clean lines and minimalist aesthetic make it a versatile piece.
colors: Two-tone: Rose Gold and Diamond White. Offers a subtle contrast for a modern look.
occasions: or as a contemporary accent to traditional South Indian attire.
description: This bracelet offers a modern twist on traditional gold jewelry. The combination of rose gold, white gold, and diamonds provides a sophisticated and versatile look. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability. The lightweight design makes it comfortable for daily wear.
